title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.
The highest Quarter Q1 2019 has 270.26 more Price in thousand Mexican pesos than the lowest Quarter Q3 2018.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos and Q3 2018 has the lowest Price in thousand Mexican pesos.
The second highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the Quarter Q2 2019.
The highest Quarter Q1 2019 has 270.26 more Price in thousand Mexican pesos than the lowest Quarter Q3 2018.
Price in thousand Mexican pesos at Quarter Q1 2019 is 1071.24 , second place is Q2 2019 at 1070.65, and thirdly is Q2 2018 at 815.93.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos has reduced over the past 6 Quarters.
Considered together, the average Price in thousand Mexican pesos in all 6 Quarters is roughly 895.62.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 5373.75.
